page.title: 11Religion
page.content: ST. LEONARD'S,Woodcote,became a parish church in 1981.It has three groups which meet regularly : Sunday School and Pathfinders , St.LeonardÂ£s Singers and three bible study groups.Each Whitsun there is a holiday club for 5 to 12 year olds.A parish walk is held each June and on the Transport Rally weekend in July,there is a March of Witness through the village with the Reading Salvation Army Band.On 16th July 1985 there is a boat trip on the Thames.A music festival weekend was held on 20th July with a Salvation Army Concert at the Oratory School and a Songs of Praise with the St.LeonardÂ£s Singers. THE METHODIST CHAPEL had their first ever wedding on 15th April 1985.To introduce their new hymnbook,a Songs of Praise was held on 5th May.They celebrated their 99th anniversary on..
